item.title: The Taste of the Day
item.description: My boss recommended I read The Taste of the Day to learn to let go of tasks. Notes Doesn’t matter what system you use, just use it all of the time The Morning Scrub Evaluate every item into one of the following categories Today: must be done today Later: Not today, not never Never: The Evening Scrub Parking lot goes to Later Today items Why didn’t this get done? Not enough time?
